Class header file: [http://code.google.com/p/bwta/source/browse/trunk/include/BWTA/Polygon.h# BWTA/Polygon.h]

A BWTA::[Polygon] is a std::vector of BWAPI::[http://code.google.com/p/bwapi/wiki/Misc#Position Position] objects, so to iterate over the vertices of a BWTA::[Polygon] you just need to iterate over the vector.

Methods:

  * [#getArea getArea]
  * [#getPerimeter getPerimeter]
  * [#getCenter getCenter]
  * [#getNearestPoint getNearestPoint]
  * [#isInside isInside]

=== getArea ===
double getArea() const;

Returns the area of the polygon.

=== getPerimeter ===
double getPerimeter() const;

Returns the perimeter of the polygon.

=== getCenter ===
[http://code.google.com/p/bwapi/wiki/BWAPIManual BWAPI]::[http://code.google.com/p/bwapi/wiki/Misc#Position Position] getCenter() const;

Returns the centroid of the polygon.

=== getNearestPoint ===
BWAPI::Position getNearestPoint(BWAPI::Position p) const;

Returns the point on the boundary of the polygon that is nearest to the given point.

=== isInside ===
bool isInside([http://code.google.com/p/bwapi/wiki/BWAPIManual BWAPI]::[http://code.google.com/p/bwapi/wiki/Misc#Position Position] p) const;

Returns true if the given point is inside the polygon.
